sentences.sentence: Classical Greek statues represented an idealization of the human body and were considered quite beautiful at the time.
sentences.translation: 古典希腊雕像代表了理想化的人体，这在当时被认为是相当美丽的。

sentences.sentence: He imagines giving up that terrific drive towards imagination and idealization and a return to the "rag and bone shop of the heart".
sentences.translation: 他想象着放弃那种可怕的对想象力和理想化的追求，回到“污秽的心的废品铺”。

sentences.sentence: They found that idealization appears to keep people together and keep them happier in marriage.
sentences.translation: 他们发现理想化似乎使人们互相依靠并在婚姻中更幸福。
